title: Blake Lively Wore the Most Daring Look of All at the People's Choice Awards

organizations.name: people's choice awards blake lively elie saab dress   2017 blake lively wore

text:
Blake Lively Elie Saab Dress   2017 Blake Lively Wore the Most Daring Look of All at the   January 18, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Blake Lively Wore the Most Daring Look of All at the   
A few weeks after hitting the Golden Globes red carpet , Blake Lively did a complete 180 outfit change for the   . The star walked the red carpet in a shimmery Elie Saab number and wore Lorraine Schwartz jewels. While we knew Blake's dress would be sparkly ( thanks to an early 'gram ), we could not have guessed it was also completely see-through. 
Blake, however, wore a black bralette underneath to keep from revealing too much. The beaded fringe minidress was one the star could definitely dance in and it left little to the imagination. We'll take this over a floor-length gown any day. Read on to see Blake's look in full, because this mama is ready to party. Related:
